user_instruction: 'Tell Jane to send me (selectionsyndicate@techforward.com) an update on the candidate assessments and check her Notion for information.'

formatted_items.content:
Subject: Request for Updated Candidate Assessments

Hi Jane,

Hope you’re doing well.

When you have a moment, could you please:

1. Send the Selection Syndicate (selectionsyndicate@techforward.com) your latest update on all candidate assessments.
2. Review your Notion workspace to ensure the information is complete and up to date before sending.

Let us know if you need anything from us. Thanks for your help!

Best regards,  
[Your Name]  
On behalf of The Selection Syndicate

final_output:
